title: How to Use a Wet Suit in Animal Crossing: New Leaf

steps.headline: Obtain 40 Tortimer medals.
steps.description: Wetsuits cannot be purchased with bells. You gain medals by completing island tours.

steps.headline: Purchase a wetsuit from Grams who will be sitting on a stool in Tortimer Island.
Put the wetsuit on.
steps.description: Find it in your inventory and tap on it.

steps.headline: Swim in the ocean.
steps.description:
Walk to the ocean's edge and press the "A" button. Keep tapping the "A" button to swim. You can also jump off the dock or cliff into the water with your wetsuit by pressing "A"
Make sure you aren't holding a fishing rod or instead  of going in the water, you will just cast your rod out.

steps.headline: Try diving.
steps.description: While in the water, press the "Y" button and continue pressing "A" to swim underwater. Swimming underwater has a time limit of 8 seconds, and your character will come back up to the surface automatically.

steps.headline: You can catch sea creature in the water by diving underwater whenever you see a shadow and catching up with it.

text:
Obtain 40 Tortimer medals. Wetsuits cannot be purchased with bells. You gain medals by completing island tours. Purchase a wetsuit from Grams who will be sitting on a stool in Tortimer Island.  Put the wetsuit on. Find it in your inventory and tap on it. Swim in the ocean. Walk to the ocean's edge and press the "A" button. Keep tapping the "A" button to swim. You can also jump off the dock or cliff into the water with your wetsuit by pressing "A"
Make sure you aren't holding a fishing rod or instead  of going in the water, you will just cast your rod out. Try diving. While in the water, press the "Y" button and continue pressing "A" to swim underwater. Swimming underwater has a time limit of 8 seconds, and your character will come back up to the surface automatically. You can catch sea creature in the water by diving underwater whenever you see a shadow and catching up with it.
